p: An antihypertensive beverage – Hridayamrith – has been developed from Himalayan shrub, viz. Crataegus crenulata. Hridayamrith is a herbal cardiac tonic and is useful in case of hypertension, angina, arrhythmia and congestive heart failure. It is an energizer, nerve soothing and refresher health tonic. The presence of flavonoids in this beverage helps in cardiotropic and vasodilator action. The regular intake of drink lowers the serum cholesterol and triglycerides.
